title: Is there counterplay to nocturne ? Is there a counter pick ?
body:
Please do tell, I hate the shit out of this guy and I never win against noct mains, NEVER.

When someone uses him to his full extent, he seems to be the most broken champion ever. A global fking zone of death that doesn't die unlike TF.

And I'm not playing an ADC here, I'm your regular bruiser/ap fighter/mage

I wish he would be deleted or nerfed to oblivion, so bad.

replies.body: NOCTURNE DOES NOT FUCKING LOSE AT FUCKING ABOVE AVERAGE ELO

i just got noc today and was suprised at how small his ult range is i was in a game today farming wraiths mid gets into fight i ulted at wraiths and couldn't even reach mid to help so needless to say mid died and i wasted ult

One word- Kiting. If you're melee, he can be hard but not impossible. If he misses his duskbringer, he loses so much power. Likewise, if you break the fear tether (easier if you're not tagged by duskbringer) he's easysauce. Also, he can be cc'd while he flies to you if you happen to know where he's coming from and you're quick as like alistar or Blitz

duskbringer is just as thick as morg Q, and guess what people say about that.

also CCing him doesn't work, spellshield.

kiting sort of, but I detest kiting as a whole.

he doesnt build armor pen outside of youmuus unlike other retarded champions like jayce/zed/khaz/fiora so for once in this goddamn fcking game building defense is actually viable. his ganks are also weak unless you're extended becase he has no actual gapcloser.

as a ball of stats, he appears to be ridiculous, but when you see that he gets kited much like trundle who can have 5k hp, 400 ad, 400 armor/mr, and 600 ms and 1.7 attack speed at the same time, it gets better.

overall his weakness is late game scaling, he cant afford to put enough arpen in his build to scale well, eventually his damage will just fall off too hard

I see him building LW more often than you think, hits like a truck and doesnt die.

The build is usually LW, lifesteal (hydra/botrk) , full tank.

...People actually think Nocturne is broken right now? What?

As for counterplay: to put it gently, Olaf absolutely tears Noc's asshole open. He's probably the most direct counter. Noc is a single-target bruiser that has the ult of an assassin; the usual bruiser counters usually work on him (APs with low-CD CC spells like Ori and Syndra, ADs with BORK/phantom dancer/youmuus, Heimerdinger and his turret bullshit, Pantheon the ultimate 1v1 bruiser).

Play tank? Too bad he'll do it better than you and kill you with his botrk.

Play bruiser? Too bad he'll build bruiser and you'll lose because spellshields are broken.

Play damage? Too bad he'll fear you and kill you right after the fear ends, flash or die.

Team up to kill him? Too bad every skill he has doubles as an escape.

Want to beat him early ? Spellshield / huge AD steroid, Nah.

Want to beat him late ? Botrk because fuck balance.
